results.title: Kangaroo
results.creator_credit: Martin Berkeley, Harry Kleiner, 20th Century Fox and Lewis Milestone
results.brief_description: In turn-of-the-century Australia, two criminals ingratiate themselves with a rancher in order to swindle him. However, the two partners become rivals for the affection of the rancher’s beautiful daughter.

constellations_other.name: Jedda: Uneven ground, the road to on-screen diversity
constellations_other.description: Jedda was the first fully funded Australian feature to be shot on colour film. It was also the first Australian film with Aboriginal actors in lead roles, however, it reflects a deeply problematic time in Australian history.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Martin Berkeley, Harry Kleiner, 20th Century Fox and Lewis Milestone
results.description: In turn-of-the-century Australia, two criminals ingratiate themselves with a rancher in order to swindle him. However, the two partners become rivals for the affection of the rancher’s beautiful daughter.
description_for_label: In turn-of-the-century Australia, two criminals ingratiate themselves with a rancher in order to swindle him. However, the two partners become rivals for the affection of the rancher’s beautiful daughter.

results.title: Jurassic Park
results.brief_description: An entrepreneur creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites experts and his two grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors â€“ a tough task when the dinosaurs escape.

constellations_other.name: Representing disasters
constellations_other.description: The devastating Indian Ocean tsunami was captured by many people on personal devices and home cameras, with the footage broadcast to the world. The event also inspired feature films that are part of a long tradition of disaster films, which often push the boundaries of VFX.

results.description: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.
description_for_label: A wealthy entrepreneur secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs drawn from prehistoric DNA. Before opening day, he invites a team of experts and his two eager grandchildren to experience the park and help calm anxious investors. However, the park is anything but amusing as the security systems go off-line and the dinosaurs escape.

results.title: Judy & Punch
results.creator_credit: Edie Kurzer, Mirrah Foulkes, Screen Australia, Pariah Productions, Soundfirm, Create NSW and VICE Media
results.brief_description: In the anarchic town of Seaside, nowhere near the sea, puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show. The show is a hit due to Judy’s superior puppeteering but Punch’s driving ambition and penchant for whisky lead to an inevitable tragedy that Judy must avenge.

constellations_other.name: True blue, true crime
constellations_other.description: Robert Connolly's The Dry is a recent Australian crime blockbuster, but the writer, director and producer's first film (and first crime film) connects to a longstanding tradition of true-blue crime stories from some of our greatest filmmakers.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge!

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Edie Kurzer, Mirrah Foulkes, Screen Australia, Pariah Productions, Soundfirm, Create NSW and VICE Media
results.description: In the anarchic town of Seaside, nowhere near the sea, puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show. The show is a hit due to Judy’s superior puppeteering but Punch’s driving ambition and penchant for whisky lead to an inevitable tragedy that Judy must avenge.
description_for_label: In the anarchic town of Seaside, nowhere near the sea, puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show. The show is a hit due to Judy’s superior puppeteering but Punch’s driving ambition and penchant for whisky lead to an inevitable tragedy that Judy must avenge.

results.title: Ju Dou
results.creator_credit: Zhi-an Zhang, Xia Rujin, Cao Juiping, Hu Jian, Liu Heng, Wenze Zhang, Yasuyoshi Tokuma, Zhang Yimou and China Film Co-Production Corporation
results.brief_description: Zhang Yimou’s Ju Dou is the first Chinese film to be nominated for an Academy Award for Best Foreign Language film. Starring Gong Li as a young woman trapped in a loveless marriage, this sensual and striking film is aided by its vivid use of Technicolor.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Zhi-an Zhang, Xia Rujin, Cao Juiping, Hu Jian, Liu Heng, Wenze Zhang, Yasuyoshi Tokuma, Zhang Yimou and China Film Co-Production Corporation
results.description: A woman married to the brutal and infertile owner of a dye mill in rural China conceives a boy with her husband’s nephew but is forced to raise her son as her husband’s heir without revealing his parentage in this circular tragedy. Filmed in glowing technicolour, this tale of romantic and familial love in the face of unbreakable tradition is more universal than its setting.
description_for_label: A woman married to the brutal and infertile owner of a dye mill in rural China conceives a boy with her husband’s nephew but is forced to raise her son as her husband’s heir without revealing his parentage in this circular tragedy. Filmed in glowing technicolour, this tale of romantic and familial love in the face of unbreakable tradition is more universal than its setting.

results.title: Journey Back to Oz
results.creator_credit: Fred Ladd, Norm Prescott and Hal Sutherland
results.brief_description: Revisit the enchanting Land of Oz as Dorothy and Toto return to find the Scarecrow as ruler of the Emerald City. Unfortunately for the new mayor, the wicked Mombi is conspiring to take over the city for herself.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Fred Ladd, Norm Prescott and Hal Sutherland
results.description: Revisit the enchanting Land of Oz as Dorothy and Toto return to find the Scarecrow as ruler of the Emerald City. Unfortunately for the new mayor, the wicked Mombi is conspiring to take over the city for herself. With the help of the Tin Woodsman, the Cowardly Lion and other familiar friends, the brave lass from Kansas sets out to save Oz. This animated musical film features an impressive voice cast, including Liza Minnelli and Ethel Merman.
description_for_label: Revisit the enchanting Land of Oz as Dorothy and Toto return to find the Scarecrow as ruler of the Emerald City. Unfortunately for the new mayor, the wicked Mombi is conspiring to take over the city for herself. With the help of the Tin Woodsman, the Cowardly Lion and other familiar friends, the brave lass from Kansas sets out to save Oz. This animated musical film features an impressive voice cast, including Liza Minnelli and Ethel Merman.

results.title: Jesus
results.brief_description: A 1979 biblical drama film directed by Peter Sykes and John Krish; Jesus primarily uses the Gospel of Luke as the main basis for the story. A voice-over narration is featured sporadically throughout the film, providing background information on characters and events.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Three and a half years of Jesus’ ministry, as told in the Gospel of Luke.
description_for_label: Three and a half years of Jesus’ ministry, as told in the Gospel of Luke.

results.title: Jeanne Dielman, 23, Quai du Commerce 1080 Bruxelles
results.creator_credit: Evelyne Paul, Corinne JÃ©nart, Paradise Films, UnitÃ© Trois, MinistÃ¨re de la Culture FranÃ§aise de Belgique, Chantal Akerman, Paul Vecchiali, Liliane de Kermadec, Alain Dahan and Guy Cavagnac
results.brief_description: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. Slowly, her ritualized daily routines begin to fall apart.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Evelyne Paul, Corinne JÃ©nart, Paradise Films, UnitÃ© Trois, MinistÃ¨re de la Culture FranÃ§aise de Belgique, Chantal Akerman, Paul Vecchiali, Liliane de Kermadec, Alain Dahan and Guy Cavagnac

results.title: Je T'Aime, Je T'Aime
results.creator_credit: Parc Film, Les Productions Fox Europa, Alain Resnais, Mag Bodard and Jacques Sternberg
results.brief_description: Recovering from an attempted suicide, a man is selected to participate in a time travel experiment that has only been tested on mice. A malfunction in the experiment causes the man to experience moments from his past in a random order.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Parc Film, Les Productions Fox Europa, Alain Resnais, Mag Bodard and Jacques Sternberg
results.description: Recovering from an attempted suicide, a man is selected to participate in a time travel experiment that has only been tested on mice. A malfunction in the experiment causes the man to experience moments from his past in a random order.
description_for_label: Recovering from an attempted suicide, a man is selected to participate in a time travel experiment that has only been tested on mice. A malfunction in the experiment causes the man to experience moments from his past in a random order.

results.title: Jaws
results.brief_description: Steven Spielberg created the summer blockbuster with this holiday horror that snapped up more tickets at the box office than the great white shark did swimmers in the waters of Amity Island. Featuring one of cinema’s greatest villains and scores, it changed the movie-going landscape forever.

constellations_other.name: When music speaks
constellations_other.description: Some characters or moments are expressed more intensely through a musical motif than dialogue or action.

results.description: When an insatiable great white shark terrorizes the townspeople of Amity Island, the police chief, an oceanographer and a grizzled shark hunter seek to destroy the blood-thirsty beast.
description_for_label: When an insatiable great white shark terrorizes the townspeople of Amity Island, the police chief, an oceanographer and a grizzled shark hunter seek to destroy the blood-thirsty beast.

results.title: Jane B. by AgnÃ¨s V.
results.creator_credit: AgnÃ¨s Varda, Olivier Radot, La Sept CinÃ©ma and CinÃ©-Tamaris
results.brief_description: The interests, obsessions, and fantasies of two singular artists converge in this inspired collaboration between AgnÃ¨s Varda and her longtime friend the actor Jane Birkin. Made over the course of a year and motivated by Birkinâ€™s fortieth birthdayâ€”a milestone she admits to some anxiety overâ€”Jane B. by AgnÃ¨s V. contrasts the private, reflective Birkin with Birkin the icon.
